channel.title: A few questions (:
channel.description:
1. How do you fix the beard ? lyk there's always a beard on my characters.
2. How do you add a teleport-emote command. <-- ( I tried looking it up, couldn't find anything )
3. How do you change the rates, like how much exp per hit ? ( On actual training , and hitting things )
THANKS ! (:

item.title: A few questions (:
item.dc:creator: @xtgscott xtgscott
item.description:
@xtgscott wrote:

No Idea man. Never had that before. Try changing your male player appereance in your player.java Find beard and set it to 0. -1 takes it off completely.

Read full topic

item.title: A few questions (:
item.dc:creator: @Next Next
item.description:
@Next wrote:

the beard stays even when you change it in ::char

Read full topic

item.title: A few questions (:
item.dc:creator: @xtgscott xtgscott
item.description:
@xtgscott wrote:

1.) Be more specific please. Do you mean you always have a beard even when you change it in your character display window? When you type ::char and you change what he looks like, you take the beard off and you still have it? Or as in you don’t have a lower jaw at all?

Read full topic
